fi.sewsiaica.uusiaika.logic

Class GameLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.sewsiaica.uusiaika.logic.GameLogic

  • public class GameLogic
extends Object
    The core logic of the game. It controls the other logic modules through an ActiveGame object created by the ActiveGameChanger object. The actions for an active game have now been moved to the GameLogicActionsForActiveGame object.
    Author:
    iah1016

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameLogic(Random random, Config config)
      The ActiveGameChanger, GameLogicActionsForActiveGame, and LanguageHandler objects are created by the constructor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameLogic

        public GameLogic(Random random,
                 Config config)
        The ActiveGameChanger, GameLogicActionsForActiveGame, and LanguageHandler objects are created by the constructor. The file array of the configFiles is also created.
        Parameters:
        random - Random is created by the Main class.
        config - Config is created by the Main class.

    • Method Detail

      • newGame

        public boolean newGame(String[] playerAndSectNames)
                throws Exception
        An active game is created and set to GameLogicActionsForActiveGame. The used Config files 0-2: [0] the Config variable values, [1] the villager names, [2] the professions.
        Parameters:
        playerAndSectNames - The names are given by the user.
        Returns:
        Returns false if at least one of the files is invalid.
        Throws:
        Exception - Throws the generic exception.

      • loadGame

        public boolean loadGame(File saveFile)
        An active game is loaded and set to GameLogicActionsForActiveGame.
        Parameters:
        saveFile - The values will be read from a text file.
        Returns:
        Returns false if the save file is invalid.

      • saveGame

        public boolean saveGame(File saveFile)
        Saves the active game by using ActiveGameChanger's method.
        Parameters:
        saveFile - The name of the save file.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the saving succeeds.

      • setActiveLanguage

        public boolean setActiveLanguage(String languageName)
        This method will change the active language if the given name is found.
        Parameters:
        languageName - The language name given as a string.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the language change is successful.

      • changeCustomLanguage

        public boolean changeCustomLanguage(File languageFile)
        A valid language is added to the languages map and its name to the custom slot of the language list.
        Parameters:
        languageFile - The file that contains the dialogue in this language.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the file is valid.

      • getActiveLanguage

        public Map<String,String> getActiveLanguage()

      • getNamesOfLanguages

        public List<String> getNamesOfLanguages()

      • conversion

        public boolean conversion(Villager villager,
                          char option)
        The Conversion actions executed by GameLogicActionsForActiveGame.
        Parameters:
        villager - The Player has chosen the target villager beforehand.
        option - (a) Persuasion, (b) Sermon, (c) Accusation.
        Returns:
        If the conversion is allowed (ie. the maximum amount of attempts has not been reached) and it is successful, then the method returns true.

      • templeActions

        public boolean templeActions(char option)
        The Temple actions executed by GameLogicActionsForActiveGame.
        Parameters:
        option - (a) Preach, (b) Offer soda (c) Buy a one-way ticket.
        Returns:
        Case (a) is returns true, unless the congregation size is zero, (b) requires a high playerCharisma and (c) a high balance.

      • trainingCentreActions

        public boolean trainingCentreActions(char option)
        The TrainingCentre actions executed by GameLogicActionsForActiveGame.
        Parameters:
        option - (a) apply for a charisma course (increases playerCharisma), (b) apply for a debate course (increases playerArgSkills).
        Returns:
        Both options (a) and (b) always return true.

      • endTurn

        public boolean endTurn()
        TurnLogic's nextTurn-method executed by GameLogicActionsForActiveGame.
        Returns:
        False equals that the game is finished.

      • endGame

        public void endGame(int endingCondition)
        Ends the active game with the given condition. High Score also checked.
        Parameters:
        endingCondition - The given ending condition.

      • getHallOfFameList

        public List<String> getHallOfFameList()

      • getConfigFiles

        public File[] getConfigFiles()

      • getActiveGame

        public ActiveGame getActiveGame()
